modName: New Menu Music with Lindsey Stirling and Peter Hollens
summary: New main menu song with awesome YouTube artists!
descriptionHtml:
I found this video on YouTube:

[youtube]BSLPH9d-jsI[/youtube]

It\'s a remake of the Skyrim main menu song, by Peter Hollens and Lindsey Stirling. It is almost completely a capella, the whole song is made only by Peter\'s voice and mouth and Lindsey\'s violin. I think it sounds even better than the original!

So, I decided to make a Main Menu Song Mod out of it. Even if you don\'t download this file, make sure you watch that video, it is absolutely epic.
author: Jay33721

files.name: New Menu Music with Peter Hollens and Lindsey Stirling
